plays.text: Penalty to Patrick Sharp 2 minutes for Hooking Darren Helm
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Troy Brouwer
Penalty to Colin Fraser 2 minutes for Roughing Tomas Holmstrom
Penalty to Tomas Holmstrom 2 minutes for Roughing Colin Fraser
Penalty to Ben Eager 10 minutes for Misconduct(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Marian Hossa 2 minutes for Slashing Dave Bolland
Penalty to Brett Lebda 2 minutes for Hooking Troy Brouwer
Penalty to Duncan Keith 2 minutes for Slashing Henrik Zetterberg
Penalty to Tomas Holmstrom 2 minutes for Tripping Matt Walker
Goal scored by Daniel Cleary assisted by Brett Lebda and Valtteri Filppula
Goal scored by Patrick Kane assisted by Brent Seabrook and Dave Bolland
Goal scored by Darren Helm assisted by Tomas Holmstrom and Brett Lebda
